title: Google Pixel 3A XL screen flashing and flickering after screen off
content:
My Google Pixel 3A XL screen flashing and flickering after the screen off, I have tried reset to factory setting but not help. When the phone restart, it is very slow, after the screen dimmed, it will continuously flashing until I restart my phone.

I am in the Netherlands, but I bought this phone from other country as second hand, how can I get someone to check my phone? I want to contact google for the repairing service but I really can't find how can I contact them on the website.

Help...
